Hi,
 
I am new to the list and I just started getting familiar with JUnit. My
purpose of using JUnit is to develop a TCK (Technology Compatibility
Kit). So, if any one has worked on JUnit for developing TCKs, please let
me know. I require a few inputs to give me a quicker start in this work.
Also, if any of you have any pointers to some useful resources on this
or related work, please do let me know.
 
Thanks in advance,
Suresh
